Description: Nile siltware jar, with cylindrical neck (flaring slightly towards the top) and a simple rim. Accessioned with rope around base of neck, and with reed stand EA 49224.
Curator's comments: For ovoid jars from Tell el-Amarna, see P. Rose, The Eighteenth Dynasty Pottery Corpus from Amarna (MEES 83, London, 2007), 100, 244.
Bibliographic references: Naville 1907-1913 / The XIth Dynasty Temple at Deir el-Bahari (3:26, pl. 33)
